segments.text: This kitchen is absolutely filthy with that overflowing mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring everywhere, soaking the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, her apron probably getting ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying a plate? While ignoring the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids climbing on a stoolâ€”dirty hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies will be full of germs now, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, probably tracking puddle water too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks grimy, unstable on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open window letting in fresh air, but inside it's nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading, who knows what's floating in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden is clean, but this indoor sloppiness revolts me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such disregard for cleanliness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything's going to be moldy if not fixed soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
